nodes.text: Eila was a female Twi'lek living in Mos Eisley. She was a con artist, involved in a plot with Kollan Xa and Ccalras Corporation to get Beeyon Nace to provide them with information from his post in the Mos Eisley Spaceport Control Tower. Eila pretended to fall in love with Nace, and then staged her own kidnapping in an effort to get him to work for Ccalras.
